doc.str: The present invention relates to a method for separating products from a mixture by reversed phase high performance liquid chromatography using a column packed with a stationary phase which is hydrophobic and a mobile phase, wherein the loading step, during which the products to be separated are introduced in the column, is carried out with an aqueous phase while applying an overpressure of at least about 0.3 MPa.
